channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 观看：来自 @Breakingviews：专门生产混合动力汽车的李想汽车公司迎来了其盈利的第一年。@KatrinaHamlin 说：即使竞争对手正为需求放缓而苦苦挣扎，创始人李想仍通过在产品阵容中增加电动汽车来冒着经过深思熟虑的风险。
item.description:
WATCH: From @Breakingviews: Li Auto which specializes in hybrid vehicles celebrated its first year of profits. Founder Li Xiang is taking a well-calculated risk by adding EVs to the line-up even as rivals struggle with slowing demand, @KatrinaHamlin says pic.twitter.com/M5WNFwpFTq

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 印度行业机构要求共同基金限制中小盘基金的流动 - 信
item.description:
India industry body asks mutual funds to limit flows in mid- and small-cap funds - letter https://t.co/7eDCQgfLme pic.twitter.com/yqxcZRaHhn

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 加拿大国家银行季度利润因金融市场部门走强而上升
item.description:
National Bank of Canada quarterly profit rises on financial markets unit strength https://t.co/gtecrdNdsu pic.twitter.com/3WUPheKVOi

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 中国总理李克强敦促加强与美国的经贸联系
item.description:
China's Premier Li urges stronger economic, trade ties with US https://t.co/AtXUqPjVCy pic.twitter.com/whSvYHtxBU

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: Just Eat 外卖公司预计 2024 年核心利润收益将增长近 40%，这主要得益于其主要英国和爱尔兰市场的强劲增长，而这一增长是由更简单、更高效的外卖业务和更高的食品价格推动的。更多信息，请点击此处：
item.description:
Just Eat Takeaway expects nearly 40% jump in 2024 core profit earnings, banking on strong growth in its key British and Irish markets that is being driven by simpler and more efficient delivery operations and higher food prices. More here: https://t.co/qYzHvhNjgx pic.twitter.com/G95xITUIyN

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 印度塔塔资本公司计划下一财年首次对外融资 7.5 亿美元
item.description:
India's Tata Capital plans to raise $750 mln in debut foreign funding next fiscal year https://t.co/79Nheiu5ME pic.twitter.com/aTWNqASfLk

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观看：据报道，苹果公司已经取消了其电动汽车项目。该公司在十年前启动了泰坦计划（Project Titan），内部称其为 "汽车计划"。
item.description:
WATCH: Apple has reportedly scraped its electric car project. The company launched Project Titan, as its car effort was known internally, a decade ago https://t.co/V51mnDNLAV pic.twitter.com/YtqUoulZSH

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯储蓄银行年利润达 160 亿美元，创历史新高
item.description:
Russia's Sberbank reports record annual profit of $16 bln https://t.co/vRO225EkKx pic.twitter.com/Y14IblIj8K

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行第一季度利润下降，因雨天资金增加
item.description:
Royal Bank of Canada's Q1 profit falls on bigger rainy-day funds https://t.co/t08qwvLWSq pic.twitter.com/NWQWtFrTjV

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观看：陷入困境的开发商碧桂园（Country Garden）透露，债权人已就该公司未偿还价值 2.05 亿美元的贷款而向其递交诉状，中国的房地产危机再度恶化。
item.description:
WATCH: China’s property crisis has taken another turn for the worse as the embattled developer Country Garden revealed a petition has been filed by the creditors against the firm over the non-payment of a loan worth $205 million https://t.co/OECv9daohI pic.twitter.com/f8OqL2aXlc

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 商户服务遭遇 12.5 亿美元重创，Worldline 股价下跌
item.description:
Worldline shares fall after $1.25 bln hit in merchant services https://t.co/74E48wninY pic.twitter.com/pV5AeTuJ9R

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 波兰 Alior 银行盈利创纪录后计划首次分红
item.description:
Poland's Alior Bank plans first dividend after record profit https://t.co/i0YYGG425X pic.twitter.com/ubbjxdK1oe

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: Doublepoint公司的WowMouse应用程序现在可以在谷歌的Pixel Watch 2上使用了。它利用手势跟踪技术让智能手表发挥交互式电脑鼠标的功能。
item.description:
Doublepoint’s WowMouse app is now available on Google’s Pixel Watch 2. It uses gesture tracking to get a smartwatch to function as an interactive computer mouse pic.twitter.com/WPvfLA5rc5

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观看：一位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉 @路透社，苹果公司已经取消了电动汽车的研发工作，而这距离这家 iPhone 制造商启动该项目已经过去了十年。
item.description:
WATCH: Apple has canceled work on its electric car, a source familiar with the matter told @Reuters, a decade after the iPhone maker kicked off the project https://t.co/V51mnDNLAV pic.twitter.com/tFGw6BbOC2

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: LG 表示，Meta 的马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）会见了 LG 的高管，双方讨论了在扩展现实设备领域加强合作以及在人工智能领域开展潜在合作的事宜。更多信息请点击这里：
item.description:
Meta’s Mark Zuckerberg met LG executives to discuss a stronger partnership in extended reality devices as well as potential cooperation in artificial intelligence, LG said. More here: https://t.co/mQUCHagG7E

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯储蓄银行 2023 年净利润比上年增长五倍多 - 财报
item.description:
Sberbank's net profit for 2023 up more than five-fold on previous year - results https://t.co/fYzNcgxK0G pic.twitter.com/SdHV7PyReN

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 独家报道：美国礼来制药公司首席执行官大卫-里克斯（David Ricks）告诉 @路透社，礼来预计最早将于明年在印度推出肥胖症药物替扎帕肽。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Exclusive: Eli Lilly expects to launch its obesity drug tirzepatide in India as early as next year, the US drugmaker's CEO David Ricks told @Reuters. More here: https://t.co/5JuzqdbSrP

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观看：美国股市收盘涨跌互现，投资者关注经济数据和美国利率的可能走向
item.description:
WATCH: US stocks closed mixed and somewhat muted as investors focused on economic data and the likely path of US rates https://t.co/NagNe5VuwF pic.twitter.com/UD6Lh1ZUqU

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 公司治理改革为一度萎靡不振的日本股市的复苏提供了动力。现在，投资者想看看这种变革是否是真的。更多信息，请点击此处：
item.description:
A corporate governance makeover has helped fuel the revival of Japan's once-moribund stock market. Now investors want to see if the change is for real. More here: https://t.co/zVIGnaOAJu

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观看：中国开发商碧桂园称，因未偿还2.05亿美元贷款，已被申请清盘，这使其债务重组前景蒙上阴影，也破坏了中国政府为恢复房地产行业信心所做的努力。
item.description:
WATCH: Chinese developer Country Garden said a liquidation petition has been filed against it for the non-payment of a $205 million loan, clouding its debt revamp prospects and undermining Beijing's effort to restore confidence in the property sector https://t.co/OECv9daohI pic.twitter.com/UX0Woqr4Ig

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观看：挪威邮轮控股公司预测第一季度将实现盈利，并将赌注押在票价上涨以及美国对加勒比海和欧洲邮轮的稳定需求上。
item.description:
WATCH: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings forecast a first-quarter profit, betting on higher ticket prices and steady demand in the US for cruises to the Caribbean and Europe https://t.co/hfOBQ72Bee pic.twitter.com/2A4lasYc8j

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: Breakingviews - 深圳让人看到中国住房的未来
item.description:
Breakingviews - Shenzhen offers glimpse of China's housing future https://t.co/PjHpBg6GWZ https://t.co/PjHpBg6GWZ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 香港宣布采取重大措施，取消所有针对住宅物业的收紧措施，以支持其萎靡不振的房地产市场，旨在帮助今年预计增长 2.5%-3.5% 的香港经济。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Hong Kong announced major measures to bolster its flagging real estate market by scrapping all tightening measures for residential properties, aimed at helping the city's economy which is expected to grow at a tepid 2.5%-3.5% this year. More here: https://t.co/ejyK1YQU28

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 法国支付公司 Worldline 因 "商誉减值 "导致全年亏损
item.description:
French payment firm Worldline posts a full-year loss after 'goodwill impairment' https://t.co/7cg2l2UkLf pic.twitter.com/cDBywJ1y5d

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 彪马首席执行官 Arne Freundt 将市场形势描述为 "充满挑战"。该公司出乎分析师意料地表示，第四季度除亚太地区外，其他地区的销售额均有所下降。中国和印度市场的强劲表现推动了销售额的增长。
item.description:
Puma CEO Arne Freundt described market conditions as 'challenging'. In a surprise to analysts, the company said it saw sales fall in all regions except the Asia-Pacific over the fourth quarter. A strong performance in China and India drove the gains there https://t.co/9g7NMugnUz pic.twitter.com/6Q4Ns8Psts

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 独家报道：瑞士矿业公司和大宗商品贸易商嘉能可集团（Glencore）正在考虑收购壳牌位于新加坡的炼油厂和石化装置。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Exclusive: Swiss miner and commodities trader Glencore is looking at buying Shell's oil refinery and petrochemical units in Singapore as the oil major seeks a buyer for the sites after earlier suitors dropped out. More here: https://t.co/5gZCiYfYag

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: Doublepoint公司的WowMouse应用可追踪手势，让智能手表发挥交互式电脑鼠标的功能
item.description:
Doublepoint’s WowMouse app tracks hand gestures, allowing smartwatches to function as an interactive computer mouse pic.twitter.com/PEtp5gKLuv

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 智利一家环境法院部分撤销了允许谷歌在该国建设数据中心的许可，要求这家美国公司修改其申请，以考虑气候变化的影响。更多信息请点击这里：
item.description:
A Chilean environmental court partially reversed a permit allowing Google to build a data center in the country, asking the US company to revise its application to take into account the effects of climate change. More here: https://t.co/cPztanykSk

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024
